subject: Delegation of Power in Implementation of the Projects : Composition of Evaluation Committee for selection of Consultants reg.
text: HRM {4m (Tf siearut T44 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (sv Wae7 ZI {eif 47a4) Fax .91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 3-5 Qa 6, #i27-10, aa, # fort-110075 0-5 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delh-110075 NHAI / Policy Guidelines / Consultancy Services 2017 No.18.25/2017 , Dated the OGth September; 2017 (Decision taken on File NoNHAI/1 1013/SRDRQIPMIS/2O17) Sub: Delegation of Power in implementation of the Projects: Composition of Evaluation Committee for selection of Consultants reg: 1_ Ref Policy guideline No. 18.24/2017 dated 21.08.2017 regarding delegation of power in implementation of the projects 2 It has been decided to follow the following  procedure for   composition of Evaluation Committee for selection of Project preparation/Design consultants and Project Supervision consultant /Independent Engineer / Authority Engineer. The Evaluation Committee for all intermediate stages of procurement of consultants shall comprise of members as per following composition: a) Concerned GM (Tech:) of Technical Division Convener 6) GM (Finance) Member GM (Tech:) from any other Technical Division not under jurisdiction of same CGM Member 2 d) Dy. GM (Tech: ) Manager (Tech:) Manager (Tech. ) of concerned Division Member 3 ii) For all intermediate stages involved in the process, recommendations of the Evaluation Committee shall be approved at CGM (HQ) level; if there is unanimity in recommendation of Evaluation Committee. In case of no unanimity, Member (in charge) will decide: jii) The award of work based on combined technical and financial evaluation shall be approved by Member concerned. 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority of NHAI. (A.K. Sadhu) Chief General Manager (Coordination) To All Officers and Employees of HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices. Dy.
